Name: photon_activation_function
Title: Training SPDNN Models with Photon Activation Functions on MNIST Dataset.
Experiment: In this experiment, we will compare the performance of SPDNN MLP and SPDNN Convolutional Neural Networks and evaluate them based on training loss, test accuracy, and training time.

Name: gumbel_softmax_activation
Title: Exploring Gumbel-Softmax Reparameterization for SPDNN Models on MNIST
Experiment: Implement a Gumbel-Softmax-based activation function within the PhotonActivation class, including temperature annealing for controlling stochasticity. Modify the forward pass to incorporate this activation, ensuring compatibility with the current setup. Design experiments comparing SPDNN performance using Gumbel-Softmax with Bernoulli and Poisson activations, focusing on metrics like accuracy, convergence rate, and training time. Analyze the potential benefits for broader applications in stochastic environments and optical processing.
